wikipedia_page.main: Carlile Henry Hayes Macartney (1842–1924) was a British painter and Orientalist, noted for his portraits.

response: :*Caroline Birch Dutton (15 August 1852 – 1950) married barrister Charles Thomas Mitchell in Norland, Middlesex on 17 August 1878. Her portrait was painted by Carlile Henry Hayes Macartney
* Carlile Henry Hayes Macartney  (1842–1924), British painter and Orientalist
